abstract: A modest rally on Wall Street accelerated in late trading on Tuesday, as another steep drop in oil prices sent the Dow Jones industrial average surging 135 points to its highest close in a month.
snippet: A modest rally on Wall Street accelerated in late trading on Tuesday, as another steep drop in oil prices sent the Dow Jones industrial average surging 135 points to its highest close in a month.
lead_paragraph: A modest rally on Wall Street accelerated in late trading on Tuesday, as another steep drop in oil prices sent the Dow Jones industrial average surging 135 points to its highest close in a month.

headline.main: Stocks Surge as Investors Cheer Drop in Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: A Drop in Oil Gives Market a Late Lift
